titleStmt.title: Richardus, prouidentia diuina, Lincol. episcopus ...
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Lincoln. Bishop (1614-1617 : Neile)
Neile, Richard, 1562-1640.

notesStmt.note: Place and date from STC (2nd ed.).
"Dat. sub Sigillo nostre quo in hac parte vtimur, octauo die mensis Ianuarij, Anno Domini Millesimo Sexcentesimo decimo Quinto [1615, i.e. 1616].
